law.catch_line: Long-Term Care Coordinating Council -- Membership of council.
law.text: The Long-Term Care Coordinating Council shall be composed of the following members from within the cabinet: the commissioner of the Department for Public Health; the commissioner of the Department for Behavioral Health, Developmental and Intellectual Disabilities; the inspector general; the director of the Division of Health Care Facilities and Services; the commissioner of the Department for Aging and Independent Living; the commissioner of the Department for Medicaid Services; the general counsel; and the long-term care ombudsman.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 103, effective July 12, 2012; and ch. 158, sec. 53, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 21, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 58, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 5, effective June 21, 2001. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 45, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 431, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1982.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2012). This statute was amended by 2012 Ky. Acts chs. 146 and 158, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
